title: Solar Assisted Water Heating (SWH) System - means a device to heat water using solar energy as heat source
clause_text: Solar Assisted Water Heating (SWH) System - means a device to heat water using solar energy as heat source. Double Frontage - means a site, having a frontage on two streets other than a corner plot.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Solar Assisted Water Heating (SWH) System - means a device to heat water using solar energy as heat source.
